RelatedSentence: Last Modified : Saturday , May 17 , 2014 at 1:37 p.m. Verner Elementary School fifth - grade teacher Kathy Perkins was chosen as one of five teachers from across the nation who will travel to Tanzania in July as part of the Trick - or - Treat UNICEF School Challenge .

A0: winners - Perkins and teachers from Georgia , Oregon , Texas and Michigan
RelatedSentence: The grand - prize winners - Perkins and teachers from Georgia , Oregon , Texas and Michigan - are traveling to Tanzania to see UNICEF programs for children that are focused on early childhood education , teacher training , life skills , the environment and health .
